summary: texture containing a colour gradient that can be altered with an editor

ports.name: Gradient
ports.text: Click this to open the editor for the gradient. See docs for a more in depth explanation.

ports.name: Smoothstep
ports.text: Enable smoothstep on changes in gradients.

ports.name: Size
ports.text: The resolution of the gradient in pixels. 256 is a good default value

ports.name: Gradient Array
ports.text: An array of Object containing pos,r,g,b,a information (see documentation for format)
